item.title: Assignments
item.description: Most of the homework is assigned from the required course textbook: Herstein, I. N. Abstract Algebra. Macmillan, 1986. ISBN: 9780023538209 or the online text book Abstract Algebra: Theory and Applications by Tom Judson. PROBLEMS DUEÂ IN Homework 1 (PDF) Lec #4 Homework 2 (PDF) Lec #7 Homework 3 (PDF) Lec #9 Homework 4 (PDF) Lec #11 Homework 5 (PDF) Lec #13 Homework 6 (PDF) Lec #14 Homework 7 (PDF) Lec #16 Homework 8 (PDF) Lec #17 Homework 9 (PDF) Lec #19 Homework 10 (PDF) Lec #E2 Homework 11 (PDF) Lec #22
